entry.body:
import Details from "@w/Details.astro";
import TradingView from "@w/TradingView.astro";

## Information

Apple Inc. is one of the most popular consumer electronics and software companies in the world.
Apple has been around for a long time now, and for good reason because their products are highly popular and are used by people all over the world.
They have always been a company that has been on the cutting edge of technology, and they are always coming up with new and innovative ways to improve the lives of their customers.

---
